UserVisibility.header: See who‚Äôs chill, who‚Äôs in their own zone üëÄ
UserVisibility.subheader: No more guessing who‚Äôs up for a chat. With Connect, everyone can set their vibe, and you can easily decide whether to start a conversation. Everything‚Äôs real, no awkwardness.
UserVisibility.feature1Desc: Only Connect users can see your vibe. Full privacy, no one outside the vibe zone can see you.
UserVisibility.feature2Desc: Your info stays with you. Only your name and vibe are shown, nothing extra is shared.
UserVisibility.feature3Desc: Any change in your status or vibe is shown to others right away. Everything‚Äôs real time.

CTA.heading: Time to make your social life more real üëæ
CTA.subheading: Tired of guessing who‚Äôs up for a chat? Connect solves that. Just set your mood, and others will know your vibe. No stress, no awkwardness. Everything‚Äôs chill and real.
CTA.testimonial: Connect helped me lose the stress of starting a conversation. Everything‚Äôs my own vibe!

Footer.description: Connect helps you find people ready to meet in cafes and social spaces, making your social experience better.
Footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest news and updates
Footer.descriptionShort: An app that reduces social anxiety and makes connecting easier

Signup.subheader: Sign up to start a better social experience
Signup.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters

Terms.accountInfoDesc: When you sign up, we collect your email, password (encrypted), and other user identifiers.
Terms.profileInfoDesc: Includes your name, interests, and any other info you provide to complete your profile.
Terms.authInfoDesc: We use Supabase Auth to manage logins, password resets, and session tokens.
Terms.mapInfoDesc: If you use map features, we collect your location, pins, and related metadata.
Terms.howWeUseDataList1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Terms.howWeUseDataList3: Personalize your experience (like showing relevant map info)
Terms.howWeUseDataList4: Communicate with you about updates, security, or support
Terms.dataSharingDesc: We do not sell your information!
Terms.securityDesc: We use industry-standard security, including encryption and access controls, to protect your data.
Terms.yourRightsList1: Request access, update, or delete your information
Terms.retentionDesc: We keep your data as long as your account is active or as required by law.
Terms.changesDesc: We may update these terms. If there are major changes, we‚Äôll let you know.
Terms.disclaimerDesc: This platform is only for initial user connections. You are 100% responsible for any in-person meetings or interactions outside the app. The Connect team is not responsible for any consequences. By using this service, you agree to these terms.

Privacy.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This page explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
Privacy.profileInfoList4: Social status (ready to chat, busy, etc.)
Privacy.mapUsageDesc: Your profile and location info (only if visibility is on) are used to show you to other users on the map.
Privacy.socialUsageDesc: Your social status helps others know if they can connect with you.
Privacy.improvementUsageDesc: We use info to improve the app, fix issues, and add new features.
Privacy.securityUsageDesc: Account info is used for authentication, security, and abuse prevention.
Privacy.dataSharingIntro: We do not sell your info. We may share info with:
Privacy.dataSharing1Desc: Supabase for hosting and storage, map providers for place names
Privacy.dataSharing2Desc: Only if visibility is on, your profile and location info are visible to others
Privacy.dataSharing3Desc: If required by law or to protect our rights and users‚Äô safety
Privacy.manageInfoList2: Request a copy of your info
Privacy.securityList1: Data encrypted in transit and at rest
Privacy.retentionList1: Info kept as long as account is active
Privacy.retentionList2: After account deletion, info is removed within 30 days
Privacy.retentionList3: Old location data is automatically deleted

ForgotPassword.subheader: No worries! Enter your email and we‚Äôll send you a reset link.
ForgotPassword.help1: ‚Ä¢ Reset link is valid for 1 hour only
ForgotPassword.help3: ‚Ä¢ If you still have issues, contact support
